comment.author: 강윤정
comment.content: Our company has a new project based on JSF and we found JSF is quite strong in presentation layer.

post.content:
FYI, IBM Releases New Versions of WebSphere Studio 5.1.2. WSAD 5.1.2 will support GA version of JavaServerFaces and early support for Service Data Object (SDO).
http://www-306.ibm.com/software/swnews/swnews.nsf/n/pmcs5ygp2y?OpenDocument&Site=wsstudio
http://www.internetnews.com/dev-news/article.php/3349281
JavaServerFaces가 뜰것 같군요...
post.title: WebSphere Studio 5.1.2.+ JavaServerFaces + Service Data Object (SDO).
